en.title: Congratulations! FE's Sellout Event PGRM, 19th April 2008! (1)
en.alt_title: Congratulations! FusionExcel's Sellout Event PGRM, 19th April 2008 (1).
en.content:
Congratulations!   FE’s Event at PGRM, KL, on 19th April 2008 was a SELLOUT event attended by a maximum capacity crowd of 1,300 Member, Leaders, VIP’s and invited guests. (FE apologize to the 200 Members who could not get seats due to event being sold out). There were Leaders and Members from Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, Australia, India, Sri Lanka, Canada, Germany, Saudi Arabia, Nigeria, Singapore, Bangladesh, etc.

FE would like to thank ALL our Members and Leaders for making the Event a GREAT SUCCESS!

Highlights Of The Event Include:

 - RM38,888 Sponsorship of Surech Kuppusamy’s Challenge to summit K-2.
 - RM16,500 donation to Children’s Wish Society of Malaysia.
 - Signing of Sri Lanka Country License.
 - Presentation by Dr.Amir Farid Isahak.
 - Special Perfect Score Award to Presidential Director KC Phoon.
 - QP Demos by Presidential Director KC Phoon.
 - Recognition of new Presidential Directors, Executive Directors and Directors.
 - Lucky Draws.
 - Entertainment by  ‘Tom Jones of Malaysia’ and the ‘Take 5 Band’.

VIPs Who Attended Include:

 - Allan Hubbert, Founder of The Children’s Wish Society of Malaysia. 
 - Tan Sri Ramon Navaratnam, President of The Children’s Wish Society of Malaysia and 
    President Transparency International Malaysia. 
 - Surech Kuppusamy,  World Class Mountaineer. 
 - Bathi Allimuthu, World Kick Boxing Champion and President of Malaysian Kick Boxing Federation. 
 - H.E. Sulay Halipa, Former Mayor of Tawi Tawi, Philippines.
 - Dr.Ronmie Yeo, Former Medical Doctor, Malaysia National Sports Council.
 - Dr.Looi Thiam Chye, Former President SMI Malaysia.
 - Foo Kok Keong, Former World Champion Badminton.
 - Shalin Zulkifli, World Bowling Champion.
 - Azidi Ameran, National Bowling Champion.
 - Dr.Amir Farid Isahak M.D, FE’s Medical Consultant and Star Newspaper Columnist.
 - Dr.Siva M.D, FE’s Medical Consultant.
 - Nisha Lakshmanan M.A.
 - Don Chan, Country Licensee Thailand.
 - Jeremiah Looi, Country Licensee Philippines.
 - Muhammed Siraj Ali, Country Licensee Sri Lanka.
